Timber Theme Framework by Shopify


Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our help page on theme settings to learn more about how you can make the theme customizable.

If you require any support for Timber, please review the documentation or contact us at timber@shopify.com
